text: Kamen Rider X is a Japanese television series. It was broadcast in 1974 on the Mainichi Broadcasting System and NET, now known as TV Asahi. It is the third entry in the Kamen Rider Series of tokusatsu shows. It starred Ryo Hayami in the title role. ==Plot== Robotics scientist Keitaro Jin and his son Keisuke become caught up in the campaign of terror by an evil organization known as "G.O.D.". They are attacked and the professor's technology gets stolen, but before Keitaro dies, he is able to perform surgery on his son. With the last of his robotics technology, he transforms his son into "Kamen Rider X". To avenge his father's death and ensure the safety of the entire world, Keisuke uses this technology as he battles the monstrous minions of G.O.D. ==Cast== * Keisuke Jin: Ryo Hayami * Ryoko Mizuki, Kiriko Mizuki: Naoko Miyama * Keitaro Jin: Jun Tazaki * T≈çbei Tachibana: Akiji Kobayashi * Chiko: Chisako Kosako * Mako: Miyuki Hayata * Narrator: Shinji Kanae ==Songs== ; Opening theme * "Set Up! Kamen Rider X" ** Lyrics: Shotaro Ishinomori ** Composition: Shunsuke Kikuchi ** Artist: Ichirou Mizuki ; Ending theme * "Ore wa X X Rider" ("I am X X Rider") ** Lyrics: Saburo Yatsude ** Composition: Shunsuke Kikuchi ** Artist: Ichirou Mizuki Category:Japanese science fiction television series Category:1974 television series debuts Category:1974 television series endings Category:1970s Japanese television series debuts Category:1970s Japanese television series endings Category:1970s Japanese television series
title: Kamen Rider X
